column1: My family and I visited Puerto Vallarta last week, we have family there so we go at least once a year. On a day where the kids were off with my sister in law, m...
Very nice place to walk around and shop. Lot's of nice stores, from jewelry shops, to Mexican art. Nice restaurants.
